subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen scored a season-high 35 points, and Boston defeated the host Indiana Pacers, 122-117, in overtime on Sunday to increase their winning streak to 12 games. The Celtics (20-2) are on their longest win streak since 1986, when they won 14 in a row on their way to the N.B.A. title.
